description.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"call to submissions: poetry","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"heading-1"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"we are putting together our first poetry collection, which we aim to publish by the end of the year.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"heading-2"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"there are no rules as to what length or genre submissions should conform, however we prefer each contributor's section be a several pages long, be that one long submission or a dozen smaller ones.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"heading-2"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}
